item.title: Accelerating Direct Preference Optimization with Prefix Sharing
item.description: Boosting LLM training speed by 1.3-1.6x, this research introduces ‘prefix sharing’ for preference optimization, processing chosen and rejected responses as one sequence to remove redundancy.
